viewNames.testResultModal: How do I add my result?

view.title: You are helping others
view.main: Using it will help all of us in NI by stopping or slowing the spread of COVID-19. This supports the health services, and helps us avoid another lockdown.
view.text: **Using this app will slow the spread of COVID-19.** This supports the health services, and helps us avoid lockdowns. You are helping to save lives. **Thank you.**

accessibility.illustrationAlt: Illustration of people using this app.

view.title: Be the first to know
view.text: **If you are in close contact** with an app user who has told their app that they have COVID-19, you will get an alert. **You wonâ€™t know who, when or where.**

modal.content:
**It uses Bluetooth to check if your phone is near others with the app.** It doesnâ€™t use GPS to track your location. This protects everyoneâ€™s privacy and only uses a very small amount of battery.

**If you get an alert** to say you have been in close contact with someone, **this is how it will pop up on your screen:**

accessibility.howWorksHint: Learn How does the app work.
accessibility.illustrationAlt: Illustration of a phone showing the words â€˜Close Contact Alertâ€™ on the screen.
accessibility.modalIllustrationAlt: Illustration of two hands holding phones that show the bluetooth symbol
accessibility.notificationIllustrationAlt: Illustration of example notification on phone showing that you have been in close contact with a person who has COVID-19.

view.title: Getting a test result
view.text:
**If you test positive for COVID-19** you can tell the app by putting in a code we send you by text. If you agree, the app will release the â€˜Random IDsâ€™ your phone has been swapping over the last 14 days. Other app users that youâ€™ve been close to will then be alerted.

**They wonâ€™t know who, when or where.**

modal.content: If you test positive for COVID-19 you will get a test code by SMS text message from **'HSCresult'** like this:
modal.content1:
When you put your test code into this app you will be asked to share the 'Random IDsâ€™ that your phone has been swapping with other app users over the last 14 days. This will allow us to tell those people that they have been exposed to COVID-19.

**We will never ask you to reply to the SMS text message. **Please ignore any message if it asks you to reply or send information.
modal.content2: So that you can use this app when travelling abroad we will securely share Random IDs with other countries. This also means that apps used by visitors from those countries will work here.

accessibility.howToAddResultHint: Learn How you can add your result.
accessibility.howToAddResultLabel: How do I add my result?
accessibility.illustrationAlt: Illustration of a medic with a clipboard standing by a car and speaking to the driver.
accessibility.modalIllustrationAlt: Speech bubble icon with HSC logo inside
accessibility.messageIllustrationAlt: Illustration of example message on phone showing that you tested positive for COVID-19.

view.title: __Nobody else__ will know
view.text:
This app never knows your name or where you are, so itâ€™s completely private. It runs in the background on Bluetooth, not GPS, and **uses very little battery**.

Only general information is collected such as the number of app users, the number of people who add their test result, and the number of people who get alerted.

We need this to prove the app works, and make it a medical device.

modal.content:
**This app never knows your name or location.** It only collects general information such as the number of app users, the number of people who add their test result, and the number of people who get a close contact alert.

**We need this information to prove the app works,** and make it a medical device.
modal.content1: To protect your privacy, and tell you as soon as possible if youâ€™ve been near someone with COVID-19, we use **automated processing.** This means that computers, not people, make some decisions, including whether or not you get a close contact alert. Some people are unhappy with this. To be able to use this app you will be asked to allow 'exposure notifications'. By doing this you are agreeing to the automated processing.

accessibility.illustrationAlt: Illustration of a person using a phone, beside icons which indicate that no identity or location tracking is happening.
accessibility.modalIllustration1Alt: Illustration of a â€˜No location trackingâ€™ sign

view.title: This app uses automated processing
view.content: Meaning computers, not people, make some decisions, including whether or not you get a close contact alert. Some people are unhappy with this.

agreement.content: **Do you agree to receiving automated instructions to 'self isolate' from this app?**

yes.buttonHint: Agree to continue and start using this app

confirm.title: Are you sure?
confirm.description: If you do not agree to automated processing you will not be able to use the app.

view.textBell: So that you can use this app when travelling abroad we will securely share Random IDs with other countries. This also means that apps used by visitors from those countries will work here.

title.default: Are you happy to start using this app?
title.ageGroup3: Having spoken to your parent, guardian or trusted adult, are you happy to use this app?

view.tc: If you tap â€˜Yesâ€™ you are accepting the Terms & Conditions.
view.optOut: **You can opt out at any time.** To do this select â€˜Leaveâ€™ in â€˜Settingsâ€™ in this app.

accessibility.yesHint: Agree to continue and start using this app

confirm.title: Are you sure?
confirm.description: If you refuse to share data you will not be able to use the app.

ios.title: Please update Apple iOS to use this app
ios.text1: You need to do this to use the â€˜Exposure Notification Serviceâ€™ created by Apple to help make apps like this work and stop COVID-19.

android.title: Please update Google Play Services to use this app
android.text1: You need to do this to use the â€˜Exposure Notification Serviceâ€™ created by Google to help make apps like this work and stop COVID-19.

view.title: Setting up your phone
view.item1: Next, you will be asked for your permission to enable contact tracing technologies and notifications for this app. Make sure Bluetooth is on.
view.item2: Please give your permission so that the app can work properly.

about.heading: About this App
about.intro:
**If you are in close contact** with an app user who has told their app that they have COVID-19, you will get an alert. **You wonâ€™t know who, when or where.**

**It uses Bluetooth to check if your phone is near others with the app.** It doesnâ€™t use GPS to track your location. This protects everyoneâ€™s privacy and only uses a very small amount of battery.

**If you get an alert** to say you have been in close contact with someone, **this is how it will pop up on your screen:**
about.notificationAlt: Image of a phone notification from the StopCOVID NI app reading: IMPORTANT: Close Contact Alert. You have been in close contact with someone who has COVID-19. Tap here to open the app and find out what to do.
about.link: Read more about this app and the technology used

message.title: Getting a test result
message.intro:
**If you test positive for COVID-19 you can tell this app.** Other app users that youâ€™ve been close to will then be alerted.

You will get a test code by SMS text message from **'HSCresult'** like this:
message.messageIllustrationAlt: Speech bubble icon with HSC logo inside

messageAlt.ios: Image of an SMS text message Notification from HSC Result reading: Your 03 Aug COVID-19 test result is POSITIVE. Please self-isolate. If using the â€˜StopCOVID NIâ€™ app add test code 1A2B3C (expires in 24 h)
messageAlt.android: Image of an SMS text message Notification from HSC Result reading: Your 03 Aug COVID-19 test result is POSITIVE. Please self-isolate. If using the â€˜StopCOVID NIâ€™ app add test code ****** (expires in 24 h)

message.content:
When you put your test code into this app you will be asked to share the 'Random IDsâ€™ that your phone has been swapping with other app users over the last 14 days. This will allow us to tell those people that they have been exposed to COVID-19.

**We will never ask you to reply to the SMS text message. **Please ignore any message if it asks you to reply or send information.
message.abroad: So that you can use this app when travelling abroad we will securely share Random IDs with other countries. This also means that apps used by visitors from those countries will work here.

privacy.title: How is my privacy protected?
privacy.section1: If you tell the app you have COVID-19, nobody else will know. **This app never knows your name or where you are, so itâ€™s completely private.**
privacy.section2:
**This app never knows your name or location.** It only collects general information such as the number of app users, the number of people who add their test result, and the number of people who get a close contact alert.

**We need this information to prove the app works,** and make it a medical device.
privacy.section3: To protect your privacy, and tell you as soon as possible if youâ€™ve been near someone with COVID-19, we use **automated processing**. This means that computers, not people, make some decisions, including whether or not you get a close contact alert. Some people are unhappy with this. To be able to use this app you have allowed 'exposure notifications'. By doing this you are agreeing to the automated processing.
privacy.pinAlt: Illustration of a â€˜No location trackingâ€™ sign

whyUse.title: Why use this contact tracing app?
whyUse.content: **Using this app will slow the spread of COVID-19.** This supports the health services, and helps us avoid lockdowns. You are helping to save lives. **Thank you.**

title.ageGroup3: IMPORTANT: Show this to an adult ðŸ‘€

description.default: You have been in close contact with someone who has COVID-19. Tap here to open the app and find out what to do.
description.ageGroup2: You have been in close contact with someone who has COVID-19. Tell your parent/guardian. Then tap here to find out what to do.
description.ageGroup3: You have been in close contact with someone who has COVID-19. Tell your parent/guardian. Then tap here to find out what to do.

enableExposure.title: Enable COVID-19 Exposure Notifications from "{{name}}"
enableExposure.description: This is needed so that this app can understand when your phone is near another phone with this app.

sendNotifications.title: "{{name}}" would like to Send You Notifications
sendNotifications.description: Notifications may include alerts, sounds and icon badges.These can be configured in Settings.

warning.default: Speak to your parent or guardian

body1.default:
You have been in close contact with someone who has COVID-19 and could be infected.

 # 

**You must self-isolate for 14 days.**
body1.ageGroup1: You have been in close contact with someone who has COVID-19 and could be infected.

intro.default:
#What are the next steps?

 ## 

First, you need to show this message to your parent or guardian. They will help you take the following actions:

text.ageGroup1:
##Self-isolate for 14 days

This will protect others and help prevent another lockdown.
text.default:
##Self-isolate for 14 days

This will protect others. You should stay off school for two weeks.

step2.text:
##Check your symptoms

Check your symptoms, even mild ones, and monitor your progress.

step3.text:
##Book a test

If you have COVID-19 symptoms, or have been advised to,

step4.text:
##Stay in one room if you can

Try to avoid contact with other people in your house.

text.ageGroup1:
##Call if you need help

Ring the Community Helpline on 0808 802 0020.
text.default:
##Call if you need help

With your parent or guardian call 0808 802 0020.

tests.heading: Add Test Result
tests.content: If you test positive for COVID-19 you can add that result to this app and alert others. This will never reveal who you are or where you are.
tests.modalContent: App users you have been in close contact with will be told that they have been exposed to someone with COVID-19 but wonâ€™t know who it was
tests.permissionError: We have not uploaded your keys as you did not grant permission.

code.error: There was an error validating the code. Please try again.

add.assistanceMessage: You will be contacted by the Public Health Agency Contact Tracing team. Please tell them that you have been using this app, and that your code expired.
add.heading: Add Test Result Code
add.description: You should only enter a Test Result Code if you have tested positive for COVID-19.
add.uploadOnlyDescription:
Test result code was already added.
You just need to submit it.

confirm.title: You might need help
confirm.text: This bit is really important to let others know they might be infected. Ask a trusted adult for help if you are not sure about anything.

result.heading: Thank you.
result.label1: You must self-isolate for {{duration}} days following your positive test result.
result.label2: Your identity will **NOT** be shared. Your personal data or any identifiable information will **NOT** be shared.
result.label2dontShare: Your random IDs have **NOT** been shared. App users you have been in close contact with will **NOT** be notified that they have been exposed to someone with COVID-19.

view.heading: Add Test Result
view.description: You have verified that you have tested positive for COVID-19. You should self-isolate for 7 days from the start of your symptoms.
view.tellMore: Iâ€™ve tested positive. Tell me more about self-isolation.

action.label: Clear Close Contact Alert
action.hint: Buttons clears your Clear Close Contact Alert and all exposure service data on your device

clearData.confirmText: Are you sure you want to clear all your Close Contacts?
clearData.error: There was an error clearing your Close Contacts. Please try again.

leave.title: Leave
leave.body:
Thank you for helping to fight COVID-19. Weâ€™re sorry to see you go. When you tap â€˜I want to leaveâ€™ we will remove all data stored by the app from your device.

Random IDs created or collected by Exposure Notification Services cannot be removed by this app. If you want to remove these, do this through your device â€˜Settingsâ€™.

control.label: I want to leave
control.hint: Exits the app and deletes all data

confirm.title: Leave
confirm.text: Are you sure you want to leave?

leave.error: There was an error clearing your data. Please try again or contact us.

usage.title: Usage Data
usage.body:
This app collects some data on how people use it. This helps us make it better, and improve our contact tracing processes.

This data is only collected with your consent and we do not use any third parties to collect it. None of this data could be used to identify you.

pause.title: Pause Tracing
pause.body: When you are wearing personal protective equipment (PPE) or protected behind a screen you should pause tracing.
pause.label: Send me a reminder to restart tracing at:

reminder.title: REMINDER: Restart Tracing
reminder.message: Tap here to open the app. Then tap `Restart Tracing` to activate contact tracing
